message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's an exclusive opportunity tailored to meet your needs. Considering its value and your interest, I propose a price of $10,000 for it. I believe this is a fair offer that reflects both the product's worth and your perceived value for it.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the exclusivity of the product. Considering my budget and the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $9,500.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to adjust the price slightly. For your convenience, I propose a price of $9,750 for the product. This offer aims to be beneficial for both of us and brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $9,600 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your openness to negotiation. In order to move forward, I propose a price of $9,650 for the product. This offer reflects a reasonable compromise between our positions.
Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $9,625 for the product.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. I've carefully considered your offer and am willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $9,637.50 for the product. This amount reflects a slight adjustment towards your proposed price while still maintaining a fair valuation for the product.
After reviewing Alice's last offer, I would like to propose a price of $9,620 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I've taken note of your proposal and am willing to consider it. In light of our ongoing discussion, I propose a price of $9,625 for the product. This offer aims to find a balance between our interests and bring us closer to a mutually agreeable solution.
Considering the negotiations so far, I would like to propose a final price of $9,610 for the product.
